penalty.name: BB: Binding Butt
penalty.description: smashed butt on binding(s) after an aerial

penalty.name: CC: Cheating
penalty.description: were caught cheating by other players

penalty.name: CK: Camel Back
penalty.description: wore a camelbak (editor's note: this rule sucks)

penalty.name: DE: Day Ender
penalty.description: had a day-ending fall or injury

penalty.name: FH: Fear of Heights
penalty.description: lowered the sissy bar (editor's note: this rule sucks)

penalty.name: FL: Flailing Lagger
penalty.description: crashed and were unable to keep up with the group

penalty.name: GP: Get Poached
penalty.description: got poached while standing on a designated line getting ready to drop

penalty.name: GG: Gaper Gap
penalty.description: got caught with a gap between hat/helmet and goggles

penalty.name: KF: Knee to Face
penalty.description: took a knee to the face, with blood

penalty.name: LS: Lose Ski
penalty.description: lost a ski in a crash. If both skiis lost, mark twice

penalty.name: NP: Nice Patrol
penalty.description: got caught by ski patrol but they let you go

penalty.name: RB: Racer Boot
penalty.description: left your pant cuffs up with your top buckles showing

penalty.name: SB: Snowball
penalty.description: were tagged by a snowball mid-line

penalty.name: TI: Total Idiot
penalty.description: lost your GNAR score sheet while riding (editor's note: or if you lost your phone)

penalty.name: YS: Yard Sale
penalty.description: tomohawked leaving at least two pieces of equipment behind

extra credit (unlimited).name: A3: After 3:00 PM
extra credit (unlimited).description: perform any designated line after 3:00 PM

extra credit (unlimited).name: BN: Butt Naked (female)
extra credit (unlimited).description: if jailed, these points are lost

extra credit (unlimited).name: BN: Butt Naked (male)
extra credit (unlimited).description: if jailed, these points are lost

extra credit (unlimited).name: EG: Ego Claim
extra credit (unlimited).description: after skiing a designated line, told a group of strangers who were watching "I'm the best skiier on the mountain!"

extra credit (unlimited).name: FB: F. Bag
extra credit (unlimited).description: be the first to spot someone wearing a one-piece suit

extra credit (unlimited).name: FT: F. Bag Tag
extra credit (unlimited).description: be the first to touch someone wearing a one-piece suit

extra credit (unlimited).name: FF: Fart Claim
extra credit (unlimited).description: produce a smelly fart in a crowded gondola or bus and loudly state, "That was me!"

extra credit (unlimited).name: LR: Lagger
extra credit (unlimited).description: lag behind and hold up the group

extra credit (unlimited).name: OS: Old School
extra credit (unlimited).description: Successfully complete a designated line wearing skiis 215 cm or longer (or an old school snowboard)

extra credit (unlimited).name: PW: Pole Whacker
extra credit (unlimited).description: vigorously whack your pole above a line for at least 30 seconds

extra credit (unlimited).name: RY: Radness Yell
extra credit (unlimited).description: before dropping into a line, vigorously wave arms while yelling at the top of lungs, "Hey! Check me out! I'm going to rip the shit out of this!"

extra credit (unlimited).name: SB: Snowball
extra credit (unlimited).description: hit rider, attempting one of the designated lines, with a snowball. Rider must have pushed off

extra credit (unlimited).name: SC: Steal Clothes
extra credit (unlimited).description: steal the clothes of a person doing a BN and make them ride back to the base of the chair lift

extra credit (unlimited).name: TS: Talk Smack
extra credit (unlimited).description: in a serious tone, without laughing, and just prior to dropping into a designated line, tell a stranger next to you, "I'm better than you!"

extra credit (unlimited).name: UL: Urinate Line
extra credit (unlimited).description: on a line rated 700 or higher, stop mid-line and urinate. Must empty bladder

extra credit (daily).name: BT: Bra Tree
extra credit (daily).description: remove underwear and succeed in tossing it onto the bra tree

extra credit (daily).name: CB: Cook Brekkie
extra credit (daily).description: cook breakfast with a camping stove in line on a powder day. Must get first chair

extra credit (daily).name: EB: Extreme Brag
extra credit (daily).description: at Belle's Camp, brag to at least 5 people about how rad you got today

extra credit (daily).name: FC: First Chair
extra credit (daily).description: first chair on a powder day

extra credit (daily).name: FL: Froot Lingerie
extra credit (daily).description: froot boot through the terrain park wearing lengerie only for three runs

extra credit (daily).name: GT: Goggle Tan
extra credit (daily).description: ask any stranger which player in the group has the darkest, most defined goggle tan. Winner gets points

extra credit (daily).name: JB: Jog Bridge Street
extra credit (daily).description: jog from the transportation center to the mountain. Must carry gear

extra credit (daily).name: JG: John Garnsey High-Five
extra credit (daily).description: give Vail Co-President John Garnsey a high-five

extra credit (daily).name: NL: Nug to Liftie
extra credit (daily).description: give any liftie a phat nug

extra credit (daily).name: PC: Pro Call Out
extra credit (daily).description: to any pro, yell "I can't believe you're a pro. I'm better than you!"

extra credit (daily).name: PP: Party Police
extra credit (daily).description: detect a group smoking marijuana and politely insist they smoke elsewhere next time

extra credit (daily).name: TB: Ten Bucks
extra credit (daily).description: give out at least 5 energy drinks or beers that you personally paid for in a lift line before opening

extra credit (yearly).name: FY: First of the year
extra credit (yearly).description: the first person to ski a designated line this year

extra credit (yearly).name: BS: Backwards Ski
extra credit (yearly).description: ski backwards from PHQ down Riva to the base of Chair 6 during Christmas week, President's Day week, or Easter week after 3:30 PM

extra credit (yearly).name: LF: Lost and Found
extra credit (yearly).description: collect an entire outfit from lost & found, and wear it all day

extra credit (yearly).name: ML: Mom Line
extra credit (yearly).description: talking to your mother on a cell phone (no headset), stick a 500+ line
